actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Dr. Bonifacio B. Aranas, Mrs. Belen Aranas, and their children, Ethel Aranas, Eileen Aranas, Bonifacio Aranas, Jr., and Lourra Aranas.

summary.text: Declares six named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Dr. Bonifacio B. Aranas, Mrs. Belen Aranas, and their children, Ethel Aranas, Eileen Aranas, Bonifacio Aranas, Jr., and Lourra Aranas.
